meta_nexara: Nexara - Effortless speech-to-text for your no-code workflows. Supports most audio and video formats, easy integration, high accuracy, low price.
hero_minutes: Processing over a million minutes monthly
hero_title: Effortless speech-to-text for your no-code workflows
hero_subtitle: Quickly add accurate speech-to-text to your n8n automations without writing a single line of complex code.
testimonial_richard: Accurate speech recognition is critical for the AskHow micro course platform, which is why we have switched to Nexara. It is many times faster and several times cheaper than our previous provider, it is easy to integrate, and it has great technical support. We are glad to have chosen Nexara and recommend the service without reservations.
integration_subtitle: Learn how to integrate Nexara in your n8n pipeline in 3 easy steps.
advantages_subtitle: Discover why you should try Nexara today.
advantages_highspeed_subtitle: Transcribe an hour of video in just 15 seconds.
advantages_easyintegration_subtitle: We design for effortless integration into your favorite no-code platforms, starting with n8n. Add transcription to your automations without needing developer skills.
advantages_accuracy_subtitle: Response quality comparable to the world's best models.
advantages_price_subtitle: Understand our API quickly with clear, concise docs. Instantly export sections to your favorite LLM like ChatGPT for further explanation or code help.
advantages_russianservice_subtitle: Supports more than 50 languages and can automatically detect the language of the audio.
advantages_flexible_subtitle: Choose On-Premise, dedicated servers, or secure Cloud API.
advantages_functionality_subtitle: Speaker diarization, smart subtitles, and timestamps.
usage_subtitle: See examples of how Nexara integrates transcription into powerful automations.
usage_step1_subtitle: Automatically transcribe recordings from Zoom or Drive via n8n. Send summaries to Slack or create tasks, saving hours on manual note-taking.
usage_step2_subtitle: Convert podcasts or video audio into text for show notes or blog posts using n8n. Speed up your content creation and reach a wider audience.
usage_step3_subtitle: Transcribe customer voicemails or feedback calls through n8n. Quickly understand needs and improve support by turning spoken words into actionable data.
pricing_subtitle: Choose the plan that suits you
pricing_flexible_point4: Support for various audio and video formats
pricing_enterprise_point4: Several times cheaper than OpenAI API
cta_subtitle: Try our service and see how easy it is to integrate Nexara into your automations.
